products.title: Black (4069)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Black (4069) Velux Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
A simple, stylish way to soften incoming light and achieve basic privacy.

 	Diffuses sunlight
 	Provides privacy
 	Installs in minutes
 	15 different colours and designs

products.title: Black (3009) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Black (3009) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Structured Black (6519)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Structured Black (6519) Velux Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the Roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice!

 	Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Interchangeable fabrics.
 	Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.
 	No visible cords ensures child safety.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Black (1047)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Black (1047) Velux Energy Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Energy Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.

products.title: Skye Raven Black (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Skye Raven Black (Blackout) Velux Windows 2014 Onwards from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Windows 2014 Onwards online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.
